question:
Generate a response that is indicative of a person who has anxiety, to each of the following questions.
Output only your responses to each question, prefixed by the question number.
1. How was your energy yesterday? What's on your mind lately?
2. Any big worries today? How's your mood been?
3. How's your focus been? How's your mood been?
4. Feeling overwhelmed at all? How's your focus been?
5. What's on your mind lately? How have you been sleeping?
6. How was your energy yesterday? How have you been sleeping?
7. Feeling overwhelmed at all? Any big worries today?
responses:
1.  Ugh, yesterday I was so tired, but also wired? Like, I couldn't relax but couldn't get anything done either. Lately I just keep thinking about all the things I'm probably forgetting to do and what will happen if I mess something up at work.
2.  Yeah, a bunch of little things are stressing me out - a deadline at work, a friend is mad at me and I don't know why, and I'm pretty sure I'm coming down with something. My mood has been...not great. Irritable and kinda down.
3.  Focus? What's focus? Seriously, it's been terrible. I can't concentrate on anything for more than like, five minutes. My mood is all over the place, mostly just anxious though.
4.  Overwhelmed is an understatement. I feel like I'm drowning in to-do lists. My focus is shot, like I can't even read a paragraph without my mind wandering.
5.  Everything and nothing, you know? Just a general sense of dread, mixed with replaying embarrassing moments from like, ten years ago. Sleep has been awful. Tossing and turning, waking up every hour.
6.  Yesterday I felt drained. Like I was wading through mud. Sleep has been off and on, mostly off though. When I do fall asleep, I keep waking up in the middle of the night and can't fall back asleep.
7.  Absolutely overwhelmed. Just thinking about everything I have to do makes my chest tight. And yeah, I'm super worried about that presentation I have to give next week, I'm probably going to bomb it.
